mapper.select: SELECT mno, id, password, role, name, phone, email, address, hobby, status, enroll_date, modify_date FROM MEMBER
SELECT mno, id, password, role, name, phone, email, address, hobby, status, enroll_date, modify_date FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO = #{mno}
SELECT mno, id, password, role, name, phone, email, address, hobby, status, enroll_date, modify_date FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS ='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( mno, id, password, role, name, phone, email, address, hobby, status, enroll_date, modify_date ) VALUES( 0, #{id}, #{password}, DEFAULT, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{hobby}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, hobby = #{hobby}, modify_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE mno = #{mno}
